lyrics:
4 contributorscapri lyricsverse 1
shes got a baby inside
and holds her belly tight

just so she knows
shes sleeping so
safely to keep her growing

verse 2
and oh when shell open her eyes
therell be no surprise
that shell grow to be
so beautifully
just like her mother
thats carrying

shes beauty
baby inside shes loving
oh capri
shes beauty
there is an angel growing peacefully
oh capri
sweet baby
see colbie caillat liveget tickets as low as 35you might also likeverse 3
things will be hard at times
but ive learned to try
just listening
patiently oh capri
sweet baby
